scenes.description: Inside the Louvre - Mona Lisa Room
Mountain - Top T-Junction - Top Left from 5-way
Mountain - Passage with traveller - Top Right from 5-way
Mountain - Top Left Stop with Piece - Left->Up->Left from 5-way
Mountain - Top T-Junction ABOVE TRAVELLER - Top Right->Up from 5-way #1
Mountain - T-junction with bottom right piece - Above traveller and then right
Mountain - Fat T-Junction - Above Traveller->Right->Down->Right OR First T-junction->Right->Up->Right
Mountain - Exit to Castle - Above Traveller->Right->Up->Up->Up
Mountain - Passage way - Above Above 3-way to ??
Mountain - Dead end with Top-Left piece -Above Above Above 3-way to ??
Mountain - Dead End to the right - Right of SECOND 5-way junction
Mountain - Left pass with woman - Left of SECOND 5-way junction
Mountain - Right bend with top-right piece - Above Woman - Left->up of SECOND 5-way junction
Mountain - Horizontal Passage - Left->up->Right of SECOND 5-way junction
Castle - Hallway 2 - At the shield on the wall
Start street - Dog and Shady guy
